title: How much does Mumbiker Nikhil earn from YouTube? - Quora

response.answer_text: 1.Youtube Ads YouTube pays him for making videos on YouTube or technically we can say that YouTube pays him money for putting ads on his videos . 2.Sponsors It is gold , you can make far more money from sponsors then you will make from YouTube videos. You just have to mention any product and give a small discription of it. That's it and the company will pay you a large money for that. 3.Affiliate I am not sure for this , as I am not watching his video for a long time . But in affiliate marketing , you just have to share affilaite links of products and then the companies pay you a small commission whenever anyone by anything (yes not only just that product but anything from that session link). I think that he also uses affilite links and makes a very good money through that.

Why you all want to know that how much a you-tuber earn? BTW there are many things that he do on YouTube. He promotes brands and get sponsored by different people and brands for his videos. Now whats his revenue from views of YouTube. Suppose there is a video on his channel which got 100K views then there are times when a viewer is shown an ad before/during/after the video. The number of times the ad is shown is added to his revenue. and 1K views = 0.10 $ is rate according to analytic and new policy of YT.
